Title: Salmar's Pork and Mushroom Pasta
Ingredients: 1/3 cup parmesan cheese, more to serve
Directions: Heat 1 Tbs of the oil in large skillet, add the onion, and cook for a couple of minutes until beginning to soften. Add the garlic and pork and cook, breaking up the meat with the back of a spoon, for 5-10 minutes, or until the meat is golden.
Stir in the tomato paste and cook for an additional minute. Pour over the wine and cook until reduced by half, then add the chicken stock, and simmer for 10 minutes.
Throw the mushrooms in on top of the pork mixture and cover until the mushrooms are fully moistened. Stir in the cream.
After the pasta is boiled and drained, stir the pork and mushroom mixture and the parmesan into the pasta. Serve with extra parmesan.
